q: Donald Rumsfeld takes particular aim at human rights advocates' reporting on Andijan.`` Self-proclaimed human rights advocates with longstanding records of opposition to the Uzbekistan government... seemed interested in embarrassing the United States,'' he wrote. The facts were often mangled in the process. As an example, he said that Human Rights Watch ignored evidence that many of the demonstrators were armed, mistakenly calling them`` peaceful protesters.'' presentation to Michael Vick Published: February 07, 2011 Updated: February 07, 2011- 7:01 PM DALLAS( AP)- The Mayor Tom of Dallas says he did not sanction giving Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick a key to the city. Michael Vick won The Associated Press Comeback Player of the Year award this past season, his second in the NFL since serving 18 months in prison for operating a dogfighting operation.
